data.description:
Moloco is a leading company in AI advertising solutions, focused on democratizing access to advanced machine learning technologies. As a Data Science Intern, you will contribute to performance improvement and cost efficiency by analyzing data and providing scientific solutions to optimize the ad-delivery system.


Responsibilities

  • Work on and improve various components of our ad-tech stack including ranking, retrieval, auction/bidding and budget pacing
  • Conduct deep-dive analysis to influence R&D decisions and strategies: analyze a large dataset with queries and scripts, extract valuable signals out of noise, and produce actionable insights into how we could optimize Molocoâ€™s complex bidding system
  • Design and deploy advanced optimization approaches to improve our ad-delivery: identifying the best ranking, retrieval and bidding strategies that strike the right balance between ROI and revenue trade-offs
  • Validating and quantifying the efficiency and performance gain from hypotheses through rigorous simulation and modeling
  • Developing a robust experiment design and metric framework, and providing reliable and unbiased insights for product and business decision making
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest researches and developments in experimentation and causal inference, and identify opportunities of applying these techniques to business challenges

Skills

  • Able and willing to work from our Redwood City, CA. office
  • Must be able to work full-time (40-hours per week) for 12-weeks during the summer of 2026 (May - September)
  • Actively enrolled in a Bachelor's, Master's or PhD program in a technical or quantitative discipline during the internship
  • Candidates pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree must be graduating and obtaining the degree by June of 2027
  • Ability to manage multiple projects at the same time while paying attention to detail and translate analysis results into business recommendations
  • Ability to work independently, owning projects end-to-end, solving problems without much guidance

Benefits

  • We take care of you and create the conditions for you to do the best work of your career.
  • We offer innovative benefits that empower our employees to take care of themselves and their families so they can do the best work of their lives.

Company Overview

  • Moloco offers programmatic advertising solutions to help optimize the client's acquisition, retention, and monetization campaigns. It was founded in 2013, and is headquartered in Redwood City, California, USA, with a workforce of 501-1000 employees. Its website is http://www.moloco.com/.

    • Company H1B Sponsorship

  • Moloco has a track record of offering H1B sponsorships, with 50 in 2025, 38 in 2024, 29 in 2023, 11 in 2022, 4 in 2021, 13 in 2020. Please note that this does not guarantee sponsorship for this specific role.
